'''Thundersoother's Diadem''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Thundersoother]].

==Description==
A very ancient diadem.<br />It shines with the light of the pacified lightning.

The ferocious Beast of Thunder<br />once enslaved people with its mighty lightning.<br />But its lightning existed only in a flash,<br />and like the lightning, its mightiness soon disappeared.

The Thundersoother defeated the beast in a lightning storm.<br />He claimed this diadem as his trophy.<br />But the past can never be fully pacified.
